title: Bullion-n-BTC
author: Bullion-n-BTC
content: Looking to do a little horse trading if anybody interested. I have TONS of silver…. Bullion coins, fractional, art bars, enameled art bars, 1oz rounds, currency, etc etc etc. Doesn’t have to be anything amazing or incredibly rare. Diy wallets or originally funded pieces. Just enjoy doing a little trading from time to time. Fine with direct trade or using escrow. Thanks guys

comments.author: tread93

I am interested in trading I have some DIY Alpen Coins and some Delos DIYs. I also have one more arculus wallet from Bitcoin 2022 if interested.
